titleStmt.title: Divine dialogues, viz. Dive's doom, Sodom's flames and Abraham's faith containing the histories of Dives and Lazarus, the destruction of Sodom, and Abraham's sacrificing his son : to which is added Joseph reviv'd, or, The history of his life and death / by George Lesly ...
titleStmt.author: Lesly, George, d. 1701.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages stained and tightly bound with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
